title: SB X-Fi Series Installation Disc for Windows XP/Vista - Drivers
description:
Warning: These software and drivers are unofficial, not supported by Creative Technology Ltd.
Use them at your own risk.
--

This installation CD does not break the Vista junctions.
All setup scripts were modified to fix that infamous bug.

--

Important note: To change the speaker configuration on Windows Vista, use the Speaker Setup. 

--

Drivers based on the latest release, 2.15.0006, featuring:

- WaveRT (Vista only)
- updated OpenAL redist 2.0.4.0
- updated DVD Audio driver
- faster installation (removed unnecessary files)
- Dolby/DTS decoding on SB046A/B/C, SB055A, SB0730/A (XP only)

--
Included software:

- 3DMIDI Player 1.10.05
- ALchemy (X-Fi Edition) 1.00.30
- Audio Console 2.52.08
- AutoMode Switcher 1.00.07 (new!)
- Console Launcher 2.40.80
- Diagnostics 5.01.23
- Entertainment Center 3.40.21
- Karaoke Player 2.00.25 (Vista) / 1.60.52 (XP)
- MediaSource 5.20.02 with the following plugins: CD-ROM Burner, DTS Neo:6 (XP only), MiniDisc
- MediaSource DVD-Audio Player 2.00.76 (x86 only)
- Plugin for Microsoft Media Center 3.10.10
- Sound Blaster Vista Control Panel 1.00.22 (x86) / 1.00.24 (x64)
- SoundFont Bank Manager 3.20.20 (with "MIDI Device Configuration Utility" for Vista only)
- Smart Recorder 2.40.20
- Speaker Connection Wizard 1.00.29 (XP only)
- THX Setup Console 3.00.22
- Vienna SoundFont Studio 2.40.73
- Volume Panel 2.20.14
- WaveStudio 7.10.17

--



--
